en: Narrator: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig have a new picture of Peppa and George.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈和猪爸爸有一张佩奇和乔治的新照片。

points.en: a new picture of Peppa and George

en: Mummy Pig: We should put this lovely new picture on the wall.
cn: 猪妈妈：我们应该把这张漂亮的新照片挂在墙上。

sentence.en: We should put this lovely new picture on the wall.
sentence.cn: 我们应该把这张漂亮的新照片挂在墙上。

examples.en: We should put this picture in a frame.
examples.cn: 我们应该把这张照片装裱起来。

examples.en: We should put this lovely new rug on the floor.
examples.cn: 我们应该把这块漂亮的新地毯放在地上。

en: Daddy Pig: Leave it to me. I am the DIY expert of the house.
cn: 猪爸爸：交给我吧。我是家里的DIY专家。

en: Mummy Pig: Are you sure you can do it?
cn: 猪妈妈：你确定你能行吗？

sentence.en: Are you sure you can do it?

examples.en: Are you sure you want to go?
Are you sure you can finish it?

en: Daddy Pig: Of course. I’ll just put a nail in the wall and hang the picture on it.
cn: 猪爸爸：当然。我只要在墙上钉颗钉子，把照片挂上去就行了。

points.en: put a nail in the wall

en: Mummy Pig: Very good. I’m just off to visit Granny and Grandpa Pig. I’ll see you later.
cn: 猪妈妈：很好。我去看姥姥和姥爷，一会儿见。

examples.en: I’ll see you tomorrow.
I’ll see you next week.

en: Mummy Pig: And, please don’t make a mess.
cn: 猪妈妈：还有，别弄乱了。

en: Daddy Pig: Mess? Ho-ho-ho.
cn: 猪爸爸：乱？呵呵呵。

en: Mummy Pig: Bye.
cn: 猪妈妈：再见。

en: Daddy Pig and Peppa Pig: Goodbye.
cn: 猪爸爸和佩奇：再见。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, can we help put up the picture?
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我们能帮忙挂照片吗？

en: Daddy Pig: You can watch, and then you’ll learn how to do it properly.
cn: 猪爸爸：你们可以看，这样就能学会怎么做了。

sentence.en: you’ll learn how to do it properly.
sentence.cn: 你们就能学会怎么做了。

examples.en: You’ll learn how to cook properly.
examples.cn: 你就能学会怎么做饭了。

examples.en: You’ll learn how to ride a bike properly.
examples.cn: 你就能学会怎么骑自行车了。

en: Daddy Pig: First, I need a tape measure and a pencil.
cn: 猪爸爸：首先，我需要卷尺和铅笔。

en: Daddy Pig: That is where I’m going to put the nail.
cn: 猪爸爸：我要把钉子钉在这里。

sentence.en: That is where I’m going to put the nail.

examples.en: That is where I’m going to hang the picture.
That is where I’m going to put the shelf.

en: Peppa Pig: Don’t break the wall, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，别把墙弄坏了。

examples.en: Don’t break the vase, George.
Don’t break the toy, Peppa.

en: Daddy Pig: Ho-ho-ho-ho-ho. Now I need a hammer and a nail.
cn: 猪爸爸：呵呵呵呵呵。现在我需要锤子和钉子。

en: Daddy Pig: Stand back, children, and watch a craftsman at work.
cn: 猪爸爸：孩子们，站远点，看工匠是怎么干活的。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里了。

points.en: knock the nail into the wall

en: Peppa Pig: Don’t break the wall, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，别把墙弄坏了。

en: Daddy Pig: Ho-ho-ho-ho-ho, don’t be silly, Peppa.
cn: 猪爸爸：呵呵呵呵呵，别傻了，佩奇。

en: Daddy Pig: Easy as pie.
cn: 猪爸爸：小菜一碟。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, it’s not meant to do that.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，不应该这样的。

sentence.en: Oh, it’s not meant to do that.

examples.en: Oh, it’s not meant to be like this.
Oh, it’s not meant to happen.
examples.cn: 哦，不应该发生这样的事。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has made a big crack in the wall.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸把墙弄出了一道大裂缝。

points.en: a big crack in the wall

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, Daddy, you’ve broken the wall.
cn: 佩奇：哦，爸爸，你把墙弄坏了。

en: Daddy Pig: It’s just a tiny crack. The picture will hide it. There.
cn: 猪爸爸：只是个小裂缝，照片能挡住。好了。

en: Peppa Pig: I can still see the crack, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我还是能看到裂缝。

sentence.en: I can still see the crack, Daddy.
sentence.cn: 爸爸，我还是能看到裂缝。

examples.en: I can still see the stain, Mummy.
examples.cn: 妈妈，我还是能看到污渍。

examples.en: I can still see the scratch, George.
examples.cn: 乔治，我还是能看到划痕。

en: Daddy Pig: Yes. I’ll just take the nail out and fill in the crack.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，我把钉子拔出来，把裂缝补上。

en: Peppa Pig: Don’t make a mess, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，别弄得一团糟。

en: Daddy Pig: Ho-ho, don’t be silly, Peppa. It’s coming out...
cn: 猪爸爸：呵呵，别傻了，佩奇。快出来了……

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, Daddy. Now you really have broken the wall.
cn: 佩奇：哦，爸爸，这下你真的把墙弄坏了。

sentence.en: Now you really have broken the wall.
sentence.cn: 这下你真的把墙弄坏了。

examples.en: Now you really have made a mess.
examples.cn: 这下你真的弄得一团糟了。

examples.en: Now you really have lost your keys.
examples.cn: 这下你真的把钥匙丢了。

en: Daddy Pig: Hmmm.
cn: 猪爸爸：嗯……

en: Peppa Pig: Do you think Mummy will notice?
cn: 佩奇：你觉得妈妈会发现吗？

sentence.en: Do you think Mummy will notice?

examples.en: Do you think Mummy will be angry?
Do you think Mummy will help us?
examples.cn: 你觉得妈妈会帮助我们吗？

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, I think she might.
cn: 猪爸爸：我觉得她会的。

en: Peppa Pig: Quick, George.
cn: 佩奇：快点，乔治。

en: Daddy Pig: What are they doing?
cn: 猪爸爸：他们在干什么？

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, we can see you.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我们能看到你。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has to mend the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸得在猪妈妈回家前修好墙。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig has to mend the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸得在猪妈妈回家前修好墙。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has to fix the roof before it rains.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸得在下雨前修好屋顶。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has to clean the car before Mummy Pig sees it.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸得在猪妈妈看到之前把车洗干净。

en: Daddy Pig: Brick, please.
cn: 猪爸爸：请给我砖头。

en: Narrator: First, Daddy Pig fills the hole with bricks.
cn: 旁白：首先，猪爸爸用砖头把洞填上。

en: Daddy Pig: There.
cn: 猪爸爸：好了。

en: Narrator: Next, Daddy Pig puts plaster over the bricks.
cn: 旁白：接着，猪爸爸在砖头上抹灰。

en: Daddy Pig: Ho-ho-ho, easy as pie.
cn: 猪爸爸：呵呵呵，小菜一碟。

en: Narrator: Then Daddy Pig paints the wall.
cn: 旁白：然后猪爸爸刷墙。

en: Daddy Pig: Good as new.
cn: 猪爸爸：和新的一样。

examples.en: The car is good as new after the wash.
examples.cn: 洗完后，车子和新的一样。

examples.en: The toy looks good as new.
examples.cn: 这个玩具看起来和新的一样。

en: Narrator: The wall is mended.
cn: 旁白：墙修好了。

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 佩奇：万岁！

en: Narrator: But look at all the mess they have made.
cn: 旁白：但你看看他们弄得多乱。

sentence.en: But look at all the mess they have made.
sentence.cn: 但你看看他们弄得多乱。

examples.en: But look at all the toys on the floor.
But look at all the crumbs on the table.
examples.cn: 但你看看桌子上的面包屑。

en: Daddy Pig: Goodness me. We’d better clean up before Mummy comes back.
cn: 猪爸爸：天哪，咱们得赶紧收拾，妈妈快回来了。

en: Narrator: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George. Then Peppa vacuums the floor. And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.
cn: 旁白：首先，猪爸爸赶紧给佩奇和乔治洗干净。然后佩奇吸地，猪爸爸收拾工具。

en: George: Mummy.
cn: 乔治：妈妈。

en: Narrator: Mummy Pig is home.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈回来了。

en: George: Mummy.
cn: 乔治：妈妈。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy’s here.
cn: 佩奇：妈妈回来了。

en: Daddy Pig: Quick! Pretend nothing has happened.
cn: 猪爸爸：快！假装什么都没发生。

examples.en: Pretend you didn’t see anything.
Pretend you are not here.

en: Mummy Pig: Hello.
cn: 猪妈妈：你们好。

en: Daddy Pig: Hello.
cn: 猪爸爸：你好。

en: Mummy Pig: What have you been doing?
cn: 猪妈妈：你们在干什么？

examples.en: What have you been up to?
What have you been working on?

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, nothing.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，没干什么。

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, I can see you’ve been doing nothing. I thought you were going to put the picture up.
cn: 猪妈妈：是啊，我看你们什么都没干。我还以为你要把照片挂上去呢。

sentence.en: I thought you were going to put the picture up.
sentence.cn: 我还以为你要把照片挂上去呢。

examples.en: I thought you were going to help me.
examples.cn: 我还以为你要来帮我呢。

examples.en: I thought you were going to call me.
examples.cn: 我还以为你要给我打电话呢。

en: Narrator: In all the excitement Daddy Pig has forgotten to put the picture up.
cn: 旁白：在一阵忙乱中，猪爸爸忘了挂照片。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig has forgotten to put the picture up.

examples.en: I forgot to bring my book.
She forgot to turn off the lights.

en: Daddy Pig: Oh.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦。

en: Mummy Pig: Well, I’m no expert, but I’m sure it’s quite easy.
cn: 猪妈妈：我不是专家，但我觉得这很简单。

en: Mummy Pig: There.
cn: 猪妈妈：好了。

en: Daddy Pig: Hmmm. Yes, that did look quite easy.
cn: 猪爸爸：嗯，确实挺简单的。

examples.en: that did look quite fun.
that did look quite tasty.

en: Peppa Pig: But when you did it, Daddy, it looked really hard.
cn: 佩奇：可你做的时候，看起来很难。

en: Daddy Pig: Shush, Peppa. Don’t tell anyone.
cn: 猪爸爸：嘘，佩奇，别告诉别人。
